类型: Size: One SizeColor: Luxury Bamboo - Denim
评论详情: I bought this as I lost most of my hair after my first cycle of Chemo. A diagnoses of breast cancer is a bitter enough blow, but to lose your hair less than 3 weeks after starting Chemo Treatment, is just as hard to bare. I have been given 2 wigs, but to be honest, even after having them expertly cut by my own hairdresser, I feel more self conscious wearing them than I do a hat. And as the wigs I have are supplied by the NHS (I live in the UK)they are synthetic, thus itchy and hot and uncomfortable. So I have resorted to hats and caps. Scarves I do on occasion, but they are fiddly! This pre-tied scarf is soft and comfortable to wear, it keeps my head warm, as until you lose your hair, you do not realise how much it does actually insulate your head. But, even though it keeps my head warm, it does not make it feel over hot. The scarf comes with a lovely card with a delightful verse, beautifully wrapped in tissue paper. It is like receiving a gift. Such little touches, when you have been given such an earth shattering, body blow of a health diagnoses makes such a difference to your day. So much thought put in to the little things. I received this Head scarf at a discount in exchange for my honest unbiased review. it has not altered my opinion in any way.

类型: Size: One SizeColor: Heather Taupe
评论详情: I purchased this hat for a gift basket I was making for someone close to me who will be having chemotherapy. I wanted something that would be very comfortable and soft so I did some research and found bamboo was best. I purchased a few different styles for the gift basket so she would have some choices. I am so glad I got these! They are so, so soft, there isn't a tag or stitch out of place that would irritate delicate skin. A few days after I ordered them (but before they came) I was talking to the person who I got these for and she was saying she wanted one of these special hats she had read about...I recognized them as bamboo hats so this basket will be greatly appreciated. Bamboo is so soft and cool but warm at the same time. I received this product at a discount for an unbiased, honest review.

评论概述: Soft, durable, super comfy, and great quality!
类型: Size: One SizeColor: Luxury Bamboo - Black
评论详情: I LOVE this head scarf!! I purchased it primarily because I ride a motorcycle and am always looking for a quality head wrap that can keep my hair from tangling into a million knots.  When I received the scarf I was more than pleased. It is super soft, but surprisingly durable. It is reinforced in the front with a band of several layers and rows of stitching, which is absolutely perfect for keeping it exactly where I put it while in the high winds on the motorcycle. When I felt the soft material I expected it to be difficult to keep in place to tie with all of my hair under it, but it stays in place nicely and because of the soft material doesn’t grab pieces of my hair in the knot. Also, it can be tied super tight or loosely and either way it stays in place and is super comfy.  I can see myself buying more of these. I’ve purchased many expensive, name brand head scarves and not a one is a great of quality as this one!!  Disclaimer: I purchased this head scarf at a discount in exchange for my review. However, my review is my honest opinion and was not influenced in any way by anything other than my experience with the product.

I LOVE all the head coverings I have bought from this company so far!  Seriously, the material and stitching is such good quality!  It really seems like they care about their products and customers!  This cover is nice because it's like a bandana, but it has a lightly padded band in the front.  It's great for wearing around the house, or even under my scarves when I go out.  I really can't say enough good things about this company.  I tell my friends about them too because they are just straight quality.  Totally worth the price.  Love them!
